title: Rexaline Hydra Dose Hyper Hydrating Skin Densifying Anti Wrinkle Cream, 1.69 Ounce
description: What it is formulated to do: This hydrating essential features the power of Rexaline Complex, which immediately moisturizes skin and progressively induces the skin to produce its own natural moisturizing factors, creating a plumping effect that minimizes the look of wrinkles. After the first application, skin is immediately soft, supple, and refreshed; after a couple of weeks, skin is firmer, denser, smoother, and more vibrant. In time, this formula restores collagen, elastin, and hyaluronic-acid synthesis to visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles and improve skin density.
